Tesla launches ‘financial leasing’ to buy cars with 0% down payment

stories.text: Well with all this talk of hyperinflation, and anecdotally seeing some of the salaries my friends are getting recruited at, I'm starting to think I'm getting a bad deal. Does your company have any kind of policy to deal with inflationary periods?
stories.title: Ask HN: Has your company ever accounted for inflation?
Minecraft, but I made it in 48 hours

stories.text:
I want to start reading more CS research papers like this one: http://ilpubs.stanford.edu:8090/422/1/1999-66.pdf

Is it important to know the structure of a research paper like what an abstract is? Or should I just dive in and start reading? Is there anything I should know before I start reading these? Obviously some papers will likely require some amount of background knowledge, and in some cases I may be able to slide by with Googling terms and concepts as I read.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to read a CS research paper?
